name: Brava! for Women in the Arts
description: Brava! for Women in the Arts cultivates the artistic expression of women, people of color, youth, LGBTQIA, and other underrepresented voices.
fullDescription: Brava! for Women in the Arts cultivates the artistic expression of women, people of color, youth, LGBTQIA, and other underrepresented voices.
